data.name: Hood: Outlaws & Legends - Forest Lords Pack
data.detailed_description:
Embody the fury of the greenwood, striking down your enemies with a range of imposing outfits and weapon skins to ensure your place among legends.

This pack contains:
  • 4 unique outfits, one for each of the game’s character classes
  • 4 unique weapon skins, one for each of the game’s character classes

These items are unlocked for use in-game immediately at release.
